text: Shefqet Nebih Gashi (born 6 June 1927) is Yugoslavian politician. He is a former President of Autonomous Socialist Province of Kosovo. Gashi served as President from 1983 until 1985. He is a former political activist. Gashi fought in the Second World War. In May 1983, he became the Chairman of the Presidency of the Autonomous Socialist Province of Kosovo. He stayed in this post for 2 years, until May 1985. He was replaced by Branislav Skembarevic. title: Shefqet Nebih Gashi
